Skin Owl - Organic Eye+ (Nourishing + Youth Stimulating Eye Concentrate)

Very nice and CLEAN product, which is very important to me. At first I thought it would be a very light gel, but I was actually surprised at the richness of it. Even though it is rich, it doesn't feel heavy or goopy on the face. The smell is pleasant and very light. Cucumbers?

Mukti Organics - Organic/Vegan Deep Cleanse Antioxidant Masque (3.5 fl oz / 100 g)
Mukti Organics
{'Brand': 'Mukti Organics', 'Scent': 'Antioxidant', 'Special Feature': 'Organic', 'Unit Count': '3.5 Ounce', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '4.3 x 3 x 2.2 inches; 3.53 Ounces', 'UPC': '741755269525'}
What a unique and effective masque! When I first opened the jar I saw that it was a clay based masque and I thought DRYING. However, this is NOT THE CASE AT ALL! The masque is carefully formulated to be both cleansing and exfoliating, but also moisturizing. I felt slight warming and tingling while the masque was on, but it was not irritating at all. The masque contains very small beads made of jojoba that soften on your skin while you have the masque on. When you wash the masque off with warm water, rub the beads in for extra moisture. I really like this product and my skin looks and feels great after use.
Cleansing, Exfoliating and Moisturizing AT THE SAME TIME.
Mukti Organics - Organic/Vegan Botanique Conditioner (3.5 fl oz / 100 ml)
Mukti Organics

The smell, oh my god, the smell! Divine! My hair is very curly and on the dry side and this conditioner works well for it. I received a small sample of this conditioner for my honest opinion.
